title: 146 - How Does Death By Firing Squad Work?
description: On today's show, the boys get an update on Mitt being scammed by a fake landlord and losing $1,000 in the process and where he goes from here, decide whether or not Bill's truck is Mickey Mouse, and dive into a loaded Pod FOD that includes the deal movie theater concession stands are floating for the new Fast and the Furious movie that they think are going to save theaters, a young terrorist who thinks his mentor Abu Hamza is losing his fastball, the convenience store clerk who bashed a wine bottle over an angry customers head, death by fire squad being back on the docket in South Carolina, plus much more before Nick sends everyone into the weekend with a couple of fresh Friday Bangerz. Make sure you subscribe to the Youtube to watch full episodes and send your submissions into the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all, and we'll see you on Wednesday.
